trans-unit.source: Draws an image within a region defined by a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" />.
trans-unit.target: 在由 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> 定义的区域内绘制图像。

trans-unit.source: **Performance Note:** A <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> provides less features then an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> for rendering images, however, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> provides performance benefits making them ideal for describing backgrounds, clip art, and for low-level drawing with <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> objects.
trans-unit.target: **性能注意：** A<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>提供较少的功能则<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>对于呈现图像，但是，<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage>提供使其理想，描述背景，剪贴画，并为低级别的绘图的性能优势与<xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>对象。

trans-unit.source: See [Drawing Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md) for more information.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅[绘制对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/drawing-objects-overview.md)有关详细信息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>是一种<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象，因此可以冻结以提高性能。

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 璝惠<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，如冻结和克隆，请参阅[可冻结对象概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Source of the image that is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 要绘制的图像源。

trans-unit.source: Defines the rectangular area in which the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 定义要在其中绘制图像的矩形区域。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> class that has the specified target <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化具有指定目标 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the source of the image
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置图像的源。

trans-unit.source: The source of the image.
trans-unit.target: 图像的源。

trans-unit.source: The default value is **null**.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是**null**。

trans-unit.target: XAML 属性用法

trans-unit.target: XAML 文本用法

trans-unit.target: 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageSource>类型。

trans-unit.target: XAML 值

trans-unit.target: *imageUri*

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] of the image file.
trans-unit.target: A[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]的图像文件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.ImageSource" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the region in which the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在其中绘制图像的区域。

trans-unit.source: The region in which the image is drawn.
trans-unit.target: 在其中绘制图像的区域。

trans-unit.source: The default is <c>Empty</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>空</c>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier Field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata Flags
trans-unit.target: 元数据标志

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing.Rect" /> 依赖项属性。
